name: Classic Espresso
description: Rich, bold espresso shot made from our signature blend of Ethiopian and Colombian beans

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Smooth espresso with steamed milk and a touch of vanilla syrup, topped with foam art

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso marked with vanilla syrup and steamed milk, finished with caramel drizzle

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth, refreshing cold-steeped coffee served over ice with a hint of sweetness

name: Avocado Toast
description: Fresh avocado spread on artisan sourdough, topped with cherry tomatoes and hemp seeds

name: Breakfast Sandwich
description: Scrambled eggs, aged cheddar, and turkey bacon on a toasted everything bagel

name: Quinoa Bowl
description: Nutrient-packed bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and tahini dressing

name: Grilled Panini
description: Pressed sandwich with fresh mozzarella, basil, tomatoes, and balsamic on ciabatta

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky pastry filled with premium dark chocolate, baked fresh daily

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Moist, homemade muffin bursting with fresh blueberries and a golden crumb topping

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Warm, gooey cinnamon roll with cream cheese frosting, made from scratch

name: Lemon Scone
description: Light, buttery scone with lemon zest and a delicate glaze, perfect with tea
